github_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to GitHub repo ${repo} in ${node}
github_file_removed: ${user} removed file ${path} in GitHub repo ${repo} in ${node}
github_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in GitHub repo ${repo} in ${node}
github_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in GitHub repo ${repo} in ${node}
